name: Jerome Cassell
description:
I am a very open and honest person. I stay very active so I do not sit on the couch and watch a lot of TV. I prefer to be on the go and I promise you that will never be bored. I love to laugh, great conversations, fine wines,romantic times and passionate nights. To me life is an adventure that should be shared and enjoyed. I love to travel, particularly outside of the US, I always enjoy experiencing other cultures and lifestyles. I believe in living a healthy, active life and in keeping in shape both physically and mentally. I enjoy the outdoors, and any type of sports. I live an active life and enjoy learning new things but I also enjoy time relaxing and understand importance of spending time with family and friends. I am very financially and emotionally stable. I am very financially successful and I live a very good life. I have achieved many of my goals in life and now I want to spend and share the rest of it with an exceptional woman.
I am looking for a serious relationship that will lead to marriage and that will last a lifetime. I want a woman who will not only be my lover but also my best friend. I believe a relationship should be based on love, respect, trust, honor, loyalty and passion for each other. I am searching for an intelligent,attractive, physically fit,humorous, adventurous, caring woman with a strong personality and sense of independence who wants to be supported by a strong caring man. If you are looking for a true gentleman and the word chivalry has a meaning to you we maybe a great match. I do believe in true and lasting love
